item.title: Distributed System
item.description: Let us work our way through http://nil.csail.mit.edu/6.824/2022/schedule.html

item.title: Inspiration
item.description: Do we have anything in common? This community is inspired from: https://www.recurse.com/ & https://theexperience.co/ Potpourri of inspiration: The Connection Machine by Danny Hillis Jeff Dean and Sanjay Ghemawat(Map Reduce and other systems) Leslie Lamport Claude Shannon - The mathematical theory of communication Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs Why is Gravity unlike other forces

item.title: Livecoding
item.description: What is Livecoding ? Link There are several tools you can use for livecoding https://sonic-pi.net/ https://tidalcycles.org/ For more check out the Awesome Repo
